document.full_text: steve stricker took control of the memorial tournament in sensational style on friday, making an ace on his penultimate hole that put him two strokes clear before he signed off with a birdie.
document.title: stricker aces the eighth to grab memorial lead
lines_and_colors: steve stricker took control of the memorial tournament in sensational style on friday, making an ace on his penultimate hole that put him two strokes clear before he signed off with a birdie.
